Articles.Content: I would like it if there were contracts to bring rich civilians on your missions to specific places, The civilians will pay quite a lot for a seat.
Also, Contract Configurator supports that today, but there's no mod that is currently using that.

This is already verified for 1.0

Really? Must have missed that. Where did they say that?

Really? Must have missed that. Where did they say that?

I can't find the post that says it, but there will be tourism contracts to take civilian Kerbals into space.
Searched thru all the devnotes from this year and couldn't find mention of it, but I know for a fact I read that they are implementing "Space Tourism" contracts in 1.0
